section.title: departments adding new Department
section.para: To add a new Department to the master list of Departments, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When adding a new Department to the master list of Departments, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a unique code to identify the Department.
Enter a brief name to describe the Department.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without adding a new Department to the master list of Departments.
Creates the Department and adds it to the master list of Departments.
